name: THE ORDER OF CHAOS CD
description:
1 BLACK FLAG 
2. PROFIT OF THE LIE 
3. HERE I STAND 
4. SPLINTER
5. THE TALE OF ELEANOR GREY 
6. KILLING MACHINE 
7. MORPHINE SERENITY
8. LIAR 
9. TOXIC NATION 
10. OUT OF ASHES (INSTRUMENTAL)
11. FOOTPRINTS 
12. THIS BLACKENED EARTH



REVIEWS - THE ORDER OF CHAOS
"At times mournful, at times incredibly violent, 'The Order Of Chaos' delivers 12 tracks of unbridled, unglorified passion, this isn't an album that could be faked; you cannot fail to come away from this feeling the inherent emotional charge" 
8.5/10 METALMOUTH

“The Order Of Chaos has bloody knuckles from all the punches it throws, but it chooses its victims carefully and deservedly - With groove, melody, refreshing dynamism and a big middle-finger salute to ignorance everywhere"  
7/10 POWERPLAY

name: THE AWAKENING CD
description:
THE AWAKENING

2010 ALBUM OF THE YEAR – METAL GODS TV – VOTED FOR BY TRUE METALHEADS!!

Artwork: Unique artwork by Paul Raymond Gregory – former works Dio, Saxon, Blind Guardian and more

1. SNAKE EYES
2. THE HERETIC
3. RAZORLINE (ON THE EDGE OF INSANITY)
4. MARCH OF THE DAMNED
5. BORN INTO PAIN
6. KMA
7. BRAVE SHALL FALL
8. THE AWAKENING
9. SHOW NO MERCY
10. WORM
11. ENEMIES OF REASON

name: THE AWAKENING OF CHAOS CD
description:
An introduction CD offering tracks from both The Awakening and The Order of Chaos + 2 Live Tracks from Bloodstock Open Air.

THE ORDER OF CHAOS
1. LIAR
2. KILLING MACHINE
3. HERE I STAND
4. PROFIT OF THE LIE

THE AWAKENING
5. SNAKE EYES
6. THE HERETIC
7. RAZORLINE
8. THE AWAKENING

LIVE FROM BLOODSTOCK OPEN AIR
9. TOXIC NATION (2011)
10. NEVER TAKE US DOWN (2009)

name: CD BUNDLE 1
description:
2 CD'S - OVER 2HRS OF PURE BRITISH METAL

SAVE £3 BUYING BOTH ALBUMS IN THIS BUNDLE

THE AWAKENING (2011)
1. SNAKE EYES
2. THE HERETIC
3. RAZORLINE (ON THE EDGE OF INSANITY)

5. BORN INTO PAIN
6. K.M.A.
7. BRAVE SHALL FALL
8. THE AWAKENING
9. SHOW NO MERCY
10. WORM
11. ENEMIES OF REASON

THE ORDER OF CHAOS (2013)
1. BLACK FLAG 
2. PROFIT OF THE LIE 
3. HERE I STAND 
4. SPLINTER
5. THE TALE OF ELEANOR GREY 
6. KILLING MACHINE 
7. MORPHINE SERENITY
8. LIAR 
9. TOXIC NATION 
10. OUT OF ASHES (INSTRUMENTAL)
11. FOOTPRINTS

REVIEWS - THE ORDER OF CHAOS
"At times mournful, at times incredibly violent, 'The Order Of Chaos' delivers 12 tracks of unbridled, unglorified passion, this isn't an album that could be faked; you cannot fail to come away from this feeling the inherent emotional charge" 
8.5/10 METALMOUTH

“The Order Of Chaos has bloody knuckles from all the punches it throws, but it chooses its victims carefully and deservedly - With groove, melody, refreshing dynamism and a big middle-finger salute to ignorance everywhere"  
7/10 POWERPLAY 


REVIEWS - AWAKENING
"Standard Bearers of Britain’s Traditional Metal Renaissance" METAL HAMMER

"Fresh, Unfettered, Untainted Metal that comes from the Soul" CLASSIC ROCK

"Fist-sized slice of Metal Greatness!" SUBBA CULTURE

"Well worth checking out – Fine Chunky Stuff!”  BRUCE DICKINSON

"A Huge Reputation in the making"ROCKSOUND

"Good to see Blighty is still pumping out Real Metal!" METAL TEAM UK

"Sound, Strong metal album and it impresses to the very end!" POWERPLAY
